headline.main: Kuroda Says Markets Could Be Caught Unready if BOJ Succeeds on Inflation
headline.print_headline: Kuroda Says Markets Could Be Caught Unready if BOJ Succeeds on Inflation

docs.snippet: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Sunday that financial markets "could be surprised" if the central bank hits its 2-percent inflation target in 2016 and interest rates in Japan start to rise as a result....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Sunday that financial markets "could be surprised" if the central bank hits its 2-percent inflation target in 2016 and interest rates in Japan start to rise as a result.

headline.print_headline: ‘Furious 7’ Out Front Again at the Box Office

docs.snippet: A “Paul Blart” sequel and the horror film “Unfriended” settled for second and third place....
docs.abstract: A “Paul Blart” sequel and the horror film “Unfriended” settled for second and third place.

headline.main: Baltimore Investigates Death of Man in Police Custody
headline.print_headline: Baltimore Investigates Death of Man in Police Custody

docs.snippet: Baltimore police were conducting a criminal investigation Sunday into the death of a man injured in their custody, and the mayor vowed to ensure the city held "the right people accountable."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltimore police were conducting a criminal investigation Sunday into the death of a man injured in their custody, and the mayor vowed to ensure the city held "the right people accountable."

headline.main: Renzi Says Italy Can't Tackle Mediterranean Migrant Crisis Alone
headline.print_headline: Renzi Says Italy Can't Tackle Mediterranean Migrant Crisis Alone

docs.snippet: Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi on Sunday called for a concerted international effort to block people-traffickers after the reported deaths of up to 700 migrants in the latest sinking in the Mediterranean....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi on Sunday called for a concerted international effort to block people-traffickers after the reported deaths of up to 700 migrants in the latest sinking in the Mediterranean.

headline.main: Hamilton Pulls Away After Three Wins in Four Races
headline.print_headline: Hamilton Pulls Away After Three Wins in Four Races

docs.snippet: Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton won the Bahrain Grand Prix for the second year in a row on Sunday with Ferrari's Kimi Raikkonen back on the podium to deny Mercedes another one-two finish under the floodlights....
docs.lead_paragraph: Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton won the Bahrain Grand Prix for the second year in a row on Sunday with Ferrari's Kimi Raikkonen back on the podium to deny Mercedes another one-two finish under the floodlights.

headline.main: Lewis Hamilton Wins Bahrain Grand Pix
headline.print_headline: Hamilton Wins Bahrain GP Ahead of Raikkonen and Rosberg

docs.snippet: Lewis Hamilton's bid for a third Formula One title is gathering momentum after another convincing win in Sunday's Bahrain Grand Prix, while his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg's status as his main challenger is under threat from a resurgent Ferrari...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton's bid for a third Formula One title is gathering momentum after another convincing win in Sunday's Bahrain Grand Prix, while his Mercedes teammate Nico Rosberg's status as his main challenger is under threat from a resurgent Ferrari team.

headline.main: Studies: Merck Drug Keytruda Effective Against 3 Cancers
headline.print_headline: Studies: Merck Drug Keytruda Effective Against 3 Cancers

docs.snippet: One of the hot new cancer immunotherapy drugs, Merck & Co.'s Keytruda, strongly benefited patients with melanoma, lung cancer and mesothelioma, according to three studies presented Sunday at the American Association for Cancer Research confere...
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the hot new cancer immunotherapy drugs, Merck & Co.'s Keytruda, strongly benefited patients with melanoma, lung cancer and mesothelioma, according to three studies presented Sunday at the American Association for Cancer Research conference in Philadelphia.

headline.main: Djokovic Beats Berdych to Win Monte Carlo Masters
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Beats Berdych to Win Monte Carlo Masters

docs.snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic of Serbia won the Monte Carlo Masters by beating Czech sixth seed Tomas Berdych 7-5 4-6 6-3 in the final on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic of Serbia won the Monte Carlo Masters by beating Czech sixth seed Tomas Berdych 7-5 4-6 6-3 in the final on Sunday.

headline.main: Iraqi Officer Under Saddam Masterminded Rise of Islamic State: Spiegel
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Officer Under Saddam Masterminded Rise of Islamic State: Spiegel

docs.snippet: A former intelligence officer for the late Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein was the mastermind behind Islamic State's takeover of northern Syria, according to a report by Der Spiegel that is based on documents uncovered by the German magazine....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former intelligence officer for the late Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein was the mastermind behind Islamic State's takeover of northern Syria, according to a report by Der Spiegel that is based on documents uncovered by the German magazine.

docs.snippet: Even when Novak Djokovic doesn't play very well, he manages to win titles....
